content: यवः [यु-अच्] {@--1@} Barley; यवाः प्रकीर्णा न भवंति शालयः <ls>Mk. 4. 17.</ls> {@--2@} A barley-corn or the weight of a barley-corn. {@--3@} A measure of length equal to (1/6) or (1/3) of an {%angula%}. {@--4@} A mark on the fingers of the hand resembling a barley-corn and supposed according to its position to indicate wealth, progeny, good fortune &c.
